Sentencas: High-temperature X-ray diffraction has been used to investigate the phase stability of lanthanum strontium cobalt oxide (LSC) for a range of materials with the formula La1-xSrxCoO3-delta (x= 0.7,0.4, and 0.2).
Titulo: Phase transitions and phase decomposition of La1-xSrxCoO3-δ in low oxygen partial pressures

Sentencas: The stability of LSC increases with La content in low oxygen partial pressures at high temperature.
Titulo: Phase transitions and phase decomposition of La1-xSrxCoO3-δ in low oxygen partial pressures

Sentencas: Oxygen vacancy ordering has been observed for all three compositions in either low oxygen pressure or under reducing gas, as evidenced by the formation of the brownmillerite phase.
Titulo: Phase transitions and phase decomposition of La1-xSrxCoO3-δ in low oxygen partial pressures

Sentencas: The crystal structure of the vacancy-ordered phase was determined using Rietveld analysis of synchrotron X-ray diffraction data.
Titulo: Phase transitions and phase decomposition of La1-xSrxCoO3-δ in low oxygen partial pressures

Sentencas: The decomposition products under low oxygen pressure and in reducing conditions have been identified and characterized, including the phase transition and thermal expansion of the primary decomposition products, LaSrCoO4 and LaSrCoO3.5.
Titulo: Phase transitions and phase decomposition of La1-xSrxCoO3-δ in low oxygen partial pressures
Phase transitions and phase decomposition of La1-xSrxCoO3-δ in low oxygen partial pressures
Phase transitions and phase decomposition of La1-xSrxCoO3-δ in low oxygen partial pressures
